duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage a team of developers in building platforms and tools in support of the organization's cloud journey.
Develop secure and scalable solutions for customers by navigating technical complexities.
Provide platforms, frameworks, and security capabilities to the development community.
Manage business priorities and make tradeoffs for pace over perfection.
Present to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Develop a point of view on new trends to advance solutions resulting in efficiencies and shorter time to market.
Organize and drive the work for the team in an efficient manner, delivering the most value to technical and business partners.

education_certification.credential: BS degree in technology or related field (Master's preferred)
